prompt.0: Please translate the following text from English to German. Example: English = "Apple" -> German = "Apfel". Text: "The approximately 1,400 deployed officers have therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact crime figures for the session's opening day will be available next week."

source_text.0: The approximately 1,400 deployed officers have therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact crime figures for the session's opening day will be available next week.

hypothesis.0:
Note: The text is written in a formal and official tone, which is typical for news articles or official reports. 

Here is the translation:

Der etwa 1.400 eingesetzten Polizisten haben sich daher sechs verdächtige Diebe von der Tasche gestellt und erkundeten nun auch mehrere Fälle von körperlicher Schädigung und sexuellen Verbrechen. Die genauen Verbrechenstatistiken für den Auftreten des Sitzungsbeginns werden in der nächsten Woche verfügbar sein.

Note: Please keep in mind that I used the formal "Sie" (plural form) instead of "Sie" (singular form) since the text is written in the formal tone and refers to a group of people (the officers).

Here is the breakdown of the translation:

* "The approximately 1,400 deployed officers" = "Der etwa 1.400 eingesetzten Polizisten"
* "have therefore arrested" = "hatten sich daher"
* "six suspected pickpockets" = "sechs verdächtige Diebe von der Tasche"
* "at the start of the carnival" = "und erkundeten

reference_text.0: Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben.
